column4: I have a question, I want to use vlc player to open the address:udp://@[ff18::0101:4]:8000, but it hints that: the firefox was not associated with any applications, I want to know how to deal with this.
well open the stream with vlc, not firefox...
uh open vlc, click file -> open stream, put in the credentials.
did you go to open stream?
